title: Where to Buy Rune Pages?
body: I can't seem to figure out where the button to buy rune pages went. And there is no "other" tab in the store. {{item:3070}} Please send help.

replies.body:
Go to the shop
Click Gameplay
Where it says Tier its a clickable box on the left hand side
Click it and click show all
Runepages will be the first 2 options to buy
https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

technically 7 rune page bundle should be shown on the bundles page, but it isn't.  They should hopefully fix that, and run at the same time the buy one get one free promotion... It has been a long while now...
Yeah, the rune pages were hiding due to the default filter.  Thanks for the screenshot and assist, Ironfield!
